traditional: 對抗
duìkàng withstand; resist; confrontation

traditional: 對抗性
duìkàngxìng antagonistic

kàngxìng resistance; capability of resisting

traditional: 抗戰
kàngzhàn war of resistance, especially the war against Japan (1937-1945)

traditional: 抗擊

traditional: 抗日戰爭
kàngrìzhànzhēng (China's) War of Resistance against Japan (1937-1945)

traditional: 抗爭

traditional: 抗訴

traditional: 抗體
kàngtǐ antibody

traditional: 電抗
diànkàng reactance

traditional: 指揮
zhǐhuī to conduct; to command; to direct

traditional: 指揮部
zhīhuībù headquarters

traditional: 揮動
huīdòng to wave sth; to brandish

traditional: 揮手
huīshǒu to wave; to flourish (one's arm or a flag)

traditional: 揮發
huīfā volatile; volatility

traditional: 揮舞
huīwǔ to brandish; to wave sth

traditional: 發揮

duījī accumulate
